DOC.brief_summary: This will be a descriptive study measuring the postâ€”void residual of patients in the third trimester and postpartum. Also, bladder scan values will be compared to the amount of urine obtained from a Foley catheter to determine the accuracy of the bladder scanner in the third trimester and postpartum.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Third Trimester Post-void Residual and Validation of Bladder Scanner in Pregnancy and Post-partum
DOC.criteria: Age greater than 18 years. Having a nonemergent Cesarean Delivery or labor epidural placed. Age less than 18 years. Emergent Cesarean delivery. No epidural labor analgesia.
